ygData.subject: RE: Oasis Warning
ygData.msgSnippet: Hahaha  good old Realm...  Do you remember how simple 1.0 was? Anyway with capping the servers to 1000 would be sweet but that will never happen.  It would
ygData.messageBody:
Hahaha good old Realm... Do you remember how simple 1.0 was?
Anyway with capping the servers to 1000 would be sweet but that will never
happen. It would casue to much trouble. I wouldnt mind if they brought up
new servers that have a cap on it. THere are way to many on the main
servers ( oringinal beta ) Last night there were close to 1800 on my
server (The Rathe) There is no way they can cap that. To many people would
be mad trying to get on those servers. But rumor is that there is going to
be a quest that you can change servers which would be great.

Qanin Skywanderer
THe Rathe 22nd circle

> From: Azor[SMTP:jmaynus@...]
> Reply To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
> Sent: Wednesday, July 28, 1999 1:07 PM
> To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [EQ-Clerics] Oasis Warning
>
> From: "Azor" <jmaynus@...>
>
> A cap might be nice but put it to low and you'll have a lot off ticked off
> people cause they can't get onto their server. If that starts to happen
> we
> might see a lot of ppl quiting the game, ya I know less ppl playing means
> more places to hunt without fighting over who gets what kill and less lag.
> But thing about that less ppl playing (less money for Verant) less money
> for
> them could mean the end of EverQuest, I mean look at other games such as
> the
> Realm. The Realm at first was a big game, but over time ppl got tired of
> it
> and they quit playing where is the Realm now? It might still be there but
> how often is it updated, how many ppl are on there now to play with or
> against? I like EQ about as much as the next person, but I have a feeling
> we won't see it around or as big as it is now for I'd say 2-3 more years,
> with games such as Middle-Earth, Asherions Call and I've heard of one more
> coming out. If these 3 games hit it big a lot of ppl with switch from EQ
> to
> them, if they switch these 3 games to put an end to EQ.
>
> **************************
> Azor
> Lvl 18 Human Cleric of The Rathe
> **************************
>
>
> > From: "Lanadina the Magician" <lanadina@...>
> > I agree that the servers need to capped. I even think 1000 on a server
> is
> > alot...I would love to see servers capped at 500. Wow,
> > would THAT be something =)
> >
> >
> >
> >
> > Lanadina
